body: The average Japanese coomers dreams
Never thought I'd see the peak plotline return, I hope more artists do this, instant favorite fr I hope this gets popular enough for its own genre one day.
Glory to reversed gender roles! Hope to see more artists contribute to this fantastic plotline!
Yo this trope is hella underrated. I want more and more. And yes, I read the previous inspirations, the one by Rebis and the other inspired by it.
noice2 keep em coming
365319 has a similar concept
H...how do I get in this world?
This is more like a comedy
Lucky guy ;-;
Any other "books" with this concept?
yoo this is a dream itself

There was another doujinshi with this same theme, it's not the 6 part series by amahara, it was a guy on a train and he asked a girl if she wanted to fuck, and I can't find this one for the life of me
Jesus fuck, this pamps my boner up to eleven
After reading The World of Moral Reversal, I became addicted to this type of story, so it's great to see a new one, even if it's a doujin of a series I don't even watch, lol.
Man, I'm glad more stories with morals reversed are coming out. I REALLY hope this becomes a genre of its own.

i love those kind of doujins where boys and girls place are reversed 
this says a lot about society

There is another gender role change hentai somewhere. I forgot what it’s called, but I do want to see more. (If you want to know some there are World End Harem, Parallel Universe and one other somewhere.)
IT SHOULD HAVE BEEN MEE!!! NOT HIM

I see some people commenting about this not being true to the series it Parodies ( art or plot) ... I've never seen it so I can't speak on that...
However I did like it as a general doujin.... I also like the plot.... The whole reverse world thing.... It reminds me of a manga I read "The World of Moral Reversal" It's funny and has decent amount of  echi scenes.. I recommend if you like the whole reverse plot thing..
Scary art
More like this pls
the art is... different and the faces are kinda hot, idk if this copied the other "society reversal" doujin but its still nice. 7/10
This is what Swordsman in the Reverse World should have been. That manga was basically a doujin but without the sex scenes it was pretty wack. Anyone got any recs for doujin with a similar concept?

Amateur art, and lazy characterisation... but the concept was actually pretty solid. Got my narrative braincells tingling, not so much my dick, but I could see this being a very strong doujin concept with improved art and more thought into the characters. Also, it's weirdly wholesome?

Looks so creepy and different, i prefer original drawing style like in anime. Also they wouldn't act like that, definitely no. Its just looks creepy and i feel like someone else's personality got into her, something like that
I liked this way more than I thought I would
Love the concept!
Hell yeah i like this manga
